= Introduction =

In this section you can find simple plugin usage and development documentation.

  * Simple plugin usage documentation guides you through the process of installing the plugin and the samples into the Pentaho BI Server.
  * Development documentation guides you through the process of downloading the source code, compiling and installing it. It also contains detailed information about the plugin implementation.

= Licensing =

Fusion charts library is available in two distinct ways:

    * <a href="http://www.fusioncharts.com/free/">Fusion Charts Free</a> - Open source and free 
    * <a href="http://www.fusioncharts.com/">Fusion Charts V3</a> - Enterprise version Link

The open source version is distributed with a GPL license, while the enterprise version is proprietary.
